name: Slash
beforeTalk: I am in dire need of a favour.
You see, a guard like me requires a
bigger weapon to protect the village.
I ask that you bring me a sword in exchange

name: Mooscles
desc: Help Bulk Bogan poomp his mooscles!
beforeTalk: Yiss, kill pesky gobln fr me.
afterTalk: Yisss, now I can continue getting stronker.

name: Crabby
desc: Help Randy relax by killing a few crabs.
beforeTalk: You see, there is a small infestation of crabs around here..
It would be of great if you could kill 10 of them..
So I can finally relax in peace.

name: Nip Noops
desc: Bulk Bogan is in dire need of your mooscles!
beforeTalk: Yiss sir.. I request your help again!
Yiss, you must bring me mail armor.
Yiss, it's to cover my Nip Noops.
